unnormalised: Borem, mhaka cardiology vixim mhazo anubhav sangcho asa, tumkam khobor asa, kallzak lagun aslolea prosnanchi. Hem soglle kaim mhoineam adim suru zale jea vellar mhaka chest pain distalo, khas korun Mumbai-nt mhajea tisrea manjleachea flat-ak denvon vochunk lagleanu. Punn suruvatich mhaka tacher dhyan dilem na, mhaka dislem ki tem fuktach gas aslem va masaleache jevnachea karnank. Vhodd chuk!
normalised: Borem, maka maji cardiology viximchi ekdamichi anubhuti vantunk zai asli, tumkam khobor asa, kallzak lagun asleleo probelm. Tem soglem kaim mhoineam adim suru zalem jevhda mhaka hirdyant dukhi bhogunk lagli, khas korun Mumbaiant mhaje tisrea manzilichea flatak sodank choddtelea vellar. Survatik, hanvem takodde kele, mhaka dislem tem fokot gas asa vo kaim tikhlea jevnantlean zalam mhun. Vhodd chuk!

unnormalised: Uprant, ek dis, dukh khub bhayanok zali. Koxi mhonnlear, sans gheunk favona oxi bhayanok. Mhajen bayel Priya-n Dr. Sharma-k phone kelo, zo amcho family physician. To ek khorech ratn, to Dr. Sharma. To turant aile ani mhaka check kelem. Tachem suruvatichem diagnosis angina asunk xokta, ani tannem mhaka cardiologist-ak zata titlem vegim bhett gheunk sanglem. Tannem ek referral letter-ui boroylem.
normalised: Uprant, eka disak, dukh khubuch tivra zali. Kiteak mhunnlear, nhisvas gheunk zaina toxem. Mhajhe bailen, Priyan turunta Doctor Sharma, amcho gharkaro doctor, taka ulo marlo. To Doctor Sharma khub ut’tum asa. To zolldiyean ailo ani taka mhaka check kele. Tachi survatiche vollokh angaina astoli, ani tannin mhaka zorinch sanglam ki tum ek cardiologista sodunk voch A-S-A-P. Tannin ek referral letterui boroilem.

unnormalised: Mhunnun, dusrea disa hanv Dr. Kapoor-ak Fortis Hospital-ant bhett gheunk gelom. Appointment gheunk khub vell laglo, punn dev bore korun, Priya-n tichi vollakh vaprun te appointment ek satodem fattlean ghevn aile. Hospital khub bharlolo aslo! Adhi Mumbai titli lok sankhi distali.
normalised: Teka lagun, dusrea disak hanvem Doctor Kapoor haka Fortis Hospitalant sodunk vochlem. Ek appointment mellounk kitlo vell laglo, punn bhagi ami ki Priyan aple lagxiliche sambandh vaprun ek satolle adim korun ghetlem. Hospitalan khub lok bhorlele! Mumbaiantlean adhe lok aasilemh dislem.

unnormalised: Dr. Kapoor, ek khub serious ani experienced doctor, tannem khub test-am sanglio. ECG, echocardiogram, stress test… sogllech. ECG-nt thode abnormalities disle. Kitlo tori vell laglea uprant, results aile. Mhaka dislem ki mhojea artery-nt ek blockage asa. Koxi mhonnlear, 70% blocked! Tumkam bhavta?
normalised: Doctor Kapoor, ek khub gambhir ani onubhavi doctor, tannin khub tests dile. E-C-G, echocardiogram, stress test… soglem. E-C-G n kaim vikruti dakhoili. Kitlo vell zalo mhunn bhogunk laglem teka, resulta aile. Mhaka kallzache dhamnent eka bhagant addthallo asa mhunn vollkhunk ailem. Mhunnlear, sattar takke addthallo! Tumank mandtolem?

unnormalised: Dr. Kapoor-an mhaka samzailem ki mhaka angioplasty korchi poddtoli. Basically, tim ek stent insert kortole ani blocked artery ugddtole. Tannem ek satoddea bhitor korun gheunk sanglem. Kiti cost? Sumar Rs. 2.5 lakh, ji ek shock aslee, punn hey, mhaka kiteak choice aslo? Health mhunje wealth, sori?
normalised: Doctor Kapooran sanglam ki mhaka angioplati korunk zai. Khorench, tanchean addthallo aslelea kallzache dhamnent ek stent dovrunk tem ughddem kortole. Tannin tem eka satolle bhitor korun gheunk sanglam. Kitcho kharch? Sumar don point panch lakh rupe, jem thodem shock asa punn, mhaje kodden kiteak dusro upay asa? Arogyachi sampatti, sori?

unnormalised: Angioplasty 15/07/2024-ak schedule keli. Hanv nervous aslom, naturally. Punn Fortis-chea staff khub bore asle. Tannim soglle kitem clear kortale ani mhaka titlem zata titlem comfortable kortale. Ti procedure itli bhayanok nasli. Thodi uncomfortable aslee, punn dukhtoli nhui.
normalised: Angioplasty pondra Julhak don hazar ani chovisak nirdharit keloli. Hanvem tras bhoglo, svabhavik zalen. Punn Fortisache sevak khub bhov ut’tum aasile. Tanin soglem spastoponnan sanglam ani mhaka kitlo sokhich zata title korun dakhoilem. Upchar khub vaitt naslo. Thoddo tras astolo, punn dukh nasli.

unnormalised: Angioplasty uprant, mhaka 2 dis hospital-ant ravonk poddlem. Tim mhajea kallzak monitor kortale ani soglle kitem stable asa mhunn paka kartale. Dr. Kapoor mhaka check korun vochunk ek ek ghanteani yeta. Super dedicated monis. Tannim mhaka zaite medications sanglio, jeo Aspirin 75mg ani Clopidogrel 75mg, jeo mhaka daily gheunk poddtat.
normalised: Angioplasty zalear mhaka don dis hospitalant ravnk poddlem. Tannim mhaje kallzak nirixtt kelem ani soglem sthir asa mhunn porthoven ghetlem. Doctor Kapoor mhaka dar ghea dar gheak check korunk aile. Khub ektarponacho monis. Tannin khub vokhdham dilim, jachea bhitor Aspirin sattur ani panch milligram ani Clopidogrel sattur ani panch milligram, jem mhaka dar disa ghevnk zai.

unnormalised: Atam, kaim mhoineam uprant, mhaka khub borem distha! Chest pain ghelo ani hanv te stairs denvon vochpak mhaka dista mhunn mhaka collapse zavnk poddtoli. Mhaka regularly check-up-ak vochunk poddta, of course. Ani mhaka thode lifestyle changes korche poddle. Unnem telacho jevn, odhik bhajio, regularly cholop (Dr. Kapoor-achea advice-ant, of course!), ani stress unnem korunk proyant. Mhaka distha ki Mumbai-nt korunk unnem zata!
normalised: Atam, kaim mhoineam uprant, mhaka khub borem dista! Kallzak dukhi geli, ani hanv tem sodank choddtolea vellar mhaka padun poddlo toxem zannam naka. Mhaka adhyopi dor vorsak check-up korunk poddta, khorench. Ani mhaka kaim jivan bodlachi korun ghevnk poddlile. Unn tellachem jevonn, odik bhajiyo, dor disa cholop (Doctor Kapoorache salacho adar ghevn, khorench!), ani stress komi korunk yotn kor. Mumbaiant te kortelim mhunnlem mhunnlear te khub kastik mhunn sangtam!

unnormalised: Soglle anubhav ek khorech wake-up call aslee. Ami bhov kuxalponnan amchea health-ak ghevtanv kiteakui chuk zavnk vell. Mhunnun, tumkam kiteakui chest pain va sans gheunk kathinai dista zaitar, tacher dhyan divonk naka! Doctor-ak bhett gheun vegim. Tem tumcho jiv vachounk xokta. Prevention cure-chea poros borem, mhunn tankam mhunnunk dista. Ani samosas ani vada pav-acher kantap ghala, lokank. Tumchem kalliz tumkam thank you mhontolem! Also, ek boro health insurance plan invest kara. Te hospital-ache bills ek killer asunk xokta, kallzak marun gele porosui!
normalised: Soglle ekdamichi vostu mhaka zago korun ghevnk poddli. Ami amchea arogyak bhov unnem mhunn chintun ghetlen jevhda ami vaitt korun ghetlen. Teka lagun, tumank kallzak kitem dukhi asta vo nhisvas ghevpak kastik zata zalear, taka mhaka takodde korinaka! Doctorak polounk voch A-S-A-P. Tem tumchea jivitak rakhunk xakta. Upchar korun ghevnk poros upran korun ghevpachem bore mhunn sangtaat. Ani samosa ani vada pav komi korunk yotn korat, logancho! Tumchem kalliz tumka dhanyavad ditolem! Toxench, ek bori arogyachi insurance yojna gheun gheat. Te hospitalache bill khub zannancher khub ghaat kortat, kallzachea addthallo astam porthoven mhunn sangtam!
